title: Field Methods in Marine Ecology
description: Supervised individual research projects in experimental marine biology. Students carry out a complete research project, including (1) the formation of hypotheses; (2) the design and implementation of experiments; (3) collection, analysis, and interpretation of data; and (4) write-up of an oral presentation.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): BIOE 107 or BIOE 108; satisfaction of the Entry Level Writing and Composition requirements.

class_notes: All students - If you completed the prerequisites but get an error message - email your proof of prerequisite material to the instructor for approval to enroll - Niko Kaplanis,nkaplanis@ucsc.edu.
